text: Mom Rajawongse Seni Pramoj (Thai:หม่อมราชวงศ์เสนีย์ ปราโมช: 26 May 1905 – 28 July 1997) was three times the Prime Minister of Thailand, a politician in the Democrat Party, lawyer, diplomat and professor. A descendant of the Thai royal family, he was the great-grandson of King Rama II. His final two terms as PM sandwiched the only term of his brother, Kukrit Pramoj. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Thailand Category:Thai lawyers Category:Asian diplomats
title: Seni Pramoj
